title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 301.3 - Policy form and rate filing and approval requirements for authorized insurers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 301.3 - Policy form and rate filing and approval requirements for authorized insurers

State Regulations

An authorized insurer providing coverage for a purchasing group or a member of such purchasing group, with respect to risks or operations in this State, shall comply with article 23 and all other provisions of the Insurance Law, rules and regulations governing policy form and rate standards, including filing and approval requirements. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
